long_description: Ideal for trail running or endurance racing, the Osprey Rev 24 Hydration Pack is designed specifically for outdoor enthusiasts and athletes who enjoy covering long distances quickly. Biostretch(TM) Body Wrap harness moves with you during high-activity endeavors; hipbelt features stabilization wings for comfort. Included 2.5-liter Hydraulics(TM) reservoir provides on the go hydration. Dual zippered hydration compartment with an integrated reservoir stability band and top hose exit port provides stable, secure reservoir storage. Removable, drop-down media pocket provides quick access to your touch-screen mobile device; it also features a stretch-mesh pocket for convenient food and trash storage. Zippered stretch-mesh hipbelt pockets and a top zippered slash pocket provide secure storage and easy access to essentials. Stretch-mesh side pockets (1 zippered and 1 open) provide easily accessible storage options. Elasticized front panel bungee on the Osprey Rev 24 Hydration Pack provides additional external storage capacity.
short_description: Ideal for trail running or endurance racing, the Osprey Rev 24 Hydration Pack is designed specifically for outdoor enthusiasts and athletes who enjoy covering long distances quickly.
